name: AppInventor 4 Tablet _ byTecx
short_description:
Setup (ING): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n9r2bN_fZxw
Setup (ITA): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EUF5s4WpWHo 

add: resolution app for tablet, menu button disable, theme holo.

What is it?
AppInventor_4_tablet originated from App Inventor and has been updated to run standalone on Windows box.

AppInventor_4_tablet can be used to develop mobile applications for Android devices.

AppInventor_4_tablet includes everything that you need to run your App Inventor Personal Server AND the Build Server!
It also contains updates and enhancements to App Inventor.

NOTE: You should make routine backups of your sources. Please note that the offline version *SHOULD NOT* be used for developing production apps because it is for learning AI only and also its not stable. Use at your own risk

By tecx
